com.metreeca.rest.handlers

Class Creator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Delegator
      • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Creator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler

    public final class Creator
extends Delegator
    Resource creator.

    Handles creation requests on the linked data container identified by the request focus item, according to the following operating modes.

    If the request target is a container

    • the request shape is redacted taking into account request user roles, Shape.Create task, Shape.Convey mode and Shape.Detail view;
    • the request body is expected to contain a description of the resource to be created matched by the redacted shape; content outside this envelope is reported with a Response.UnprocessableEntity status code and a structured trace element.

    Otherwise:

    • the request is reported with a Response.NotImplemented status code.

    On successful body validation:

    • the resource to be created is assigned a unique identifier based on the stem of the stem of the request focus item and a name generated by either the default UUID-based or a custom-provided name generator;

    On successful resource creation, the IRI of the newly created resource is advertised through the Location HTTP response header.

    See Also:
    CBD - Concise Bounded Description

      • Creator

        public Creator(Function<Request,String> slug)
        Creates a resource creator.
        Parameters:
        slug - a function mapping from the creation request to the name to be assigned to the newly created resource; must return a non-null unique value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if slug is null
